channel.title: Security Now!
channel.description: Steve Gibson, the man who coined the term spyware and created the first anti-spyware program, creator of Spinrite and ShieldsUP, discusses the hot topics in security today with Leo Laporte. Winner of the 2009 and 2007 people's choice award for best Technology/Science podcast.
channel.generator: Feeder 2.3.2(1632); Mac OS X Version 10.6.8 (Build 10K549) http://reinventedsoftware.com/feeder/

image.title: Security Now!
image.description: A weekly look at security issues with Steve Gibson of ShieldsUP!

channel.itunes:author: TWiT
channel.itunes:subtitle: A weekly look at security issues with Steve Gibson of ShieldsUP!
channel.itunes:summary: Steve Gibson, the man who coined the term spyware and created the first anti-spyware program, creator of Spinrite and ShieldsUP, discusses the hot topics in security today with Leo Laporte. Winner of the 2009 and 2007 people's choice award for best Technology/Science podcast.

item.title: Security Now 356: Your Questions, Steve's Answers #145
item.description:
Hosts: Steve Gibson with Leo Laporte

Obama and Stuxnet, FLAME update, LinkedIn breach, your questions, and more.

Download or subscribe to this show at twit.tv/sn.

We invite you to read, add to, and amend our show notes.

For 16kpbs versions, transcripts, and note s (including fixes), visit Steve's site: grc.com, also the home of the best disk maintenance and recovery utility ever written Spinrite 6.

Audio bandwidth is provided by Winamp, subscribe to TWiT and all your favorite podcasts with the ultimate media player, download it for free at Winamp.com.
